net.openhft.chronicle.bytes

Interface StreamingDataInput<S extends StreamingDataInput<S>>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Bytes<Underlying>, net.openhft.chronicle.bytes.ByteStringParser<B>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBytes, MappedBytes, NativeBytes, SubBytes, SubZeroedBytes, VanillaBytes, ZeroedBytes

    public interface StreamingDataInput<S extends StreamingDataInput<S>>
    This data input has a a position() and a limit()

      • readUTFΔ

        @Nullable
default String readUTFΔ()
        The same as readUTF() except the length is stop bit encoded. This saves one byte for strings shorter than 128 chars. null values are also supported
        Returns:
        a Unicode string or null if writeUTFΔ(null) was called

      • readUTFΔ

        default <ACS extends Appendable & CharSequence> boolean readUTFΔ(ACS sb)
                                                          throws net.openhft.chronicle.bytes.UTFDataFormatRuntimeException
        The same as readUTFΔ() except the chars are copied to a truncated StringBuilder.
        Parameters:
        sb - to copy chars to
        Returns:
        true if there was a String, or false if it was null
        Throws:
        net.openhft.chronicle.bytes.UTFDataFormatRuntimeException

        long address()
      throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Obtain the underlying address. This is for expert users only.
        Returns:
        the underlying address of the buffer
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the underlying buffer is on the heap
